name: LBM
template:
#BMI Calculator
wt = {{payload.Wt}}
ht = {{payload.Ht}}
age = {{payload.Age}}
gen = "{{payload.Gen}}"
wt = round(wt,2)
ht = ht/100
bmi = wt/(pow(ht,2))
bmi = round(bmi,2)
#print("BMI is: "+ str(bmi))
bfp = 0
if gen=="male":
    bfp = 1.20 * bmi + 0.23 * age - 16.2
elif gen=="female":
    bfp = 1.20 * bmi + 0.23 * age - 5.4
bfp = round(bfp,2)
bfm = round(((bfp*wt)/100),2)
lbm = wt - bfm
lbm = round(lbm,2)
print(lbm)
#print("Body Fat Percentage is: " + str(bfp))
